Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/Marquette
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 69th, Loomis, 63rd and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 69th, Loomis, 63rd then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Marquette.

Allow extra travel time.
